terms.seoTitle: General Terms and Conditions of Sale - Paris 2024 Olympic ticketing
terms.seoDescription: Read the general terms and conditions of sale for the Paris 2024 Ticketing website, including users’ rights and obligations, intellectual property, personal data management, and more.
terms.title: General Terms and Conditions of Sale (GTC)
terms.introduction:
These general terms and conditions of sale (GTC) govern the contractual relationship between the Customer (you) and Paris 2024 Ticketing.
The website accessible at https://jo2024.mkcodecreations.dev/ allows the Customer to reserve and purchase tickets to attend Olympic events. Accessing the site and using its services implies full and unreserved acceptance of these GTC.
terms.definition:
Ticket: nominative entry pass to an event.
Order: all tickets reserved and/or purchased by the Customer via the website.
Price: total amount payable by the Customer for their Order, including fees.
Customer Account: secure personal space created by the Customer to track their orders.
terms.application: These GTC apply to all ticket sales concluded on the website. They prevail over any other document. No purchasing conditions may, unless expressly approved in writing by the Organizer, take precedence over them. Any conflicting condition proposed by the Customer will, absent express acceptance, be unenforceable against the Organizer, regardless of when it may have been brought to its attention.
terms.order:
Ticket selection: the Customer chooses the event, date, number of seats, and pricing category.
Cart validation: the cart contents are displayed with a price summary.
Identification / Account creation: mandatory to finalize the reservation.
Secure payment: by credit card (CB, Visa, Mastercard), 3D Secure, or any other method indicated on the site.
Order confirmation: a confirmation email and the e-ticket(s) are sent to the provided address.
terms.prizes:
Prices are quoted in euros, including all taxes and service fees, calculated at the time of order validation.
All orders are payable immediately. In case of bank authorization refusal, the order will be automatically cancelled.
The Organizer reserves the right to modify its prices at any time, but tickets will be charged based on the rates in effect at the time of the order.
terms.delivery:
Tickets are dematerialized and sent by email as a PDF or QR code.
The Customer is responsible for printing and safekeeping their tickets.
No tickets will be reissued in case of loss or forgetfulness by the Customer.
In case of technical issues, the Customer may contact customer service at: admin.jo2024@mail.com
terms.cancellation:
In accordance with Article L. 221-28 of the French Consumer Code, the right of withdrawal does not apply to tickets for cultural or sporting events.
However, if the event is cancelled by the Organizer, the Customer will be refunded the amount of their Order within 30 days following the announcement of cancellation.
No refund will be granted in case of no‐show at the event.
terms.responsibility:
The Organizer cannot be held liable for direct or indirect damages caused by the use of the site or its services, including data loss, viruses, or service interruption.
The Customer alone is responsible for using their tickets and must comply with the venue’s rules.
The Organizer cannot be held liable in case of unforeseeable or unavoidable events (extreme weather, authorities’ decisions, etc.).
The Customer agrees to respect the internal regulations of the Olympic venue; any breach may result in exclusion without refund.
terms.personalData:
The personal data collected during the Order are necessary for managing the commercial relationship and fulfilling orders. They are processed in accordance with applicable regulations (GDPR).
The Customer has the right to access, rectify, restrict, erase, and object to the processing of their personal data. To exercise these rights, the Customer may contact the Organizer at: admin.jo2024@mail.com
For more information on how we handle your data, please see our Privacy Policy at: https://jo2024.mkcodecreations.dev/privacy-policy
terms.intellectualProperty:
All elements of the site (texts, images, logos, videos, etc.) are protected by copyright and intellectual property rights. Any total or partial reproduction or representation of the site or any of its elements without express authorization is prohibited.
The Organizer’s trademarks and logos are registered trademarks. Any unauthorized use may constitute infringement.
terms.governingLaw:
These GTC are governed by French law. In case of dispute, French courts shall have sole jurisdiction.
In the event of a disagreement relating to the interpretation or execution of these GTC, the Customer agrees to contact the Organizer to seek an amicable solution before any legal action.
terms.contact: For any questions or complaints, the Customer may contact customer service at: admin.jo2024@mail.com
terms.update:
These GTC may be amended at any time. The terms in effect at the time of the Order shall apply. Customers are advised to review the GTC regularly on the site.
